title: Trinitarian Conversations: Interviews With Ten Theologians (You're Included)
description: Grace Communion International sponsors a video program called "You're Included," in which we interview various theologians about the practical aspects of Trinitarian theology. These interviews are transcribed and many are available in e-books. In this volume, we compile the conversations we've had with ten theologians, in 50 interviews.
author: Michael D. Morrison
